bug.author: shimat
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 4.2, 4.3 Operating System / Platform => Windows (UWP) 64 Bit Compiler => Visual Studio 2019 16.5.2
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
When building highgui for UWP, an error occurs in the following line. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/4.3.0/modules/highgui/src/window_winrt.cpp#L36>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/4.3.0/modules/highgui/src/window_winrt.cpp#L36</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>C1083 Cannot open include file: 'window_winrt_bridge.hpp': No such file or directory C:\Projects\opencv_files\opencv\modules\highgui\src\window_winrt.cpp 36 </denchmark-code>
The error is resolved by replacing <> with "". #include <window_winrt_bridge.hpp> // â†“ #include "window_winrt_bridge.hpp" <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
The problem can be reproduced on x64, Win32, ARM and ARM64 platforms. # PowerShell cmake -G "Visual Studio 16 2019" ` -A x64 ` -D CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME=WindowsStore ` -D CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION=10.0 ` -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ` -D BUILD_opencv_highgui=ON ` -D BUILD_opencv_world=ON ` path/to/opencv
msbuild OpenCV.sln /t:build /p:platform=x64 <denchmark-h:h5>Issue submission checklist</denchmark-h>
I report the issue, it's not a question
I checked the problem with documentation, FAQ, open issues, answers.opencv.org, Stack Overflow, etc and have not found solution
I updated to latest OpenCV version and the issue is still there
There is reproducer code and related data files: videos, images, onnx, etc
